meaningMnemonic: If you <kanji>serve</kanji> someone a certain <kanji>quantity</kanji> of understanding, you're <vocabulary>making allowances</vocabulary>. You're <vocabulary>taking into consideration</vocabulary> all extenuating circumstances.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi for both kanji. You learned these readings with the kanji, so you should be able to read this on your own.
